means: 不会下沉的，不会沉底的

sentence.Network_en: It was billed as an unsinkable ship due to its construction.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过它的建造方法来看,它被造得像永不沉没的轮船.

sentence.Network_en: The unsinkable ship was even not fit to travel.
sentence.Network_cn: 这艘不沉的船甚至不适合旅行.

sentence.Network_en: Ironically, the Titanic was advertised as being unsinkable.
sentence.Network_cn: 讽刺的是, 泰坦尼克号曾被宣传为不会沉没的船.
